verbose_text: To estimate the corresponding effects due to changes in human PPARdelta protein expression, we analysed PPARdelta target genes, such as perilipin-2 (PLIN2), carnitine palmitoyltransferase 1alpha (CPT1A) and angiopoietin related protein 4 (ANGPTL4), none of which had putative miR-9 target sites as evaluated by bioinformatic analyses.
